Bloqueamos dispositivos para segurarnos de que son seguros e que a túa información persoal no se amosa a terceiros. Se necesitas entrar nun modo Fastboot e utilizar o teu dispositivo, desbloquéao primeiro.
Recorda: non poderás usar \"Atopar dispositivo\" despois de que o teléfono estea desbloqueado.

"1. Asegúrate de que inseriches un cartón SIM no teu dispositivo. 2. Desactivar á Wi-Fi e activar os datos móbeis. Asegúrate de que o teu dispositivo pode conectar a internet a través dos datos móbeis. 3. Preme \"Engadir conta\" a continuación para asociar a túa Conta Mi con este dispositivo. 4. Descarga a ferramenta de desbloqueo do noso sitio web. Lembra que tes que desbloquear os dispositivos usando un computador. Descargar aquí:"

"1. Prema \"Engadir conta\" a continuación para asociar a súa Mi Account con este disposotivo. 2. Descargue a ferramenta de desbloqueo da nosa páxina web. Teña en conta que debe desbloquear os dispositivos usando un computador. Descargar aquí:"

"You can save backups locally or to the cloud. Local backups can be stored on your mobile device, computer, or USB drive.
Mobile device Save your system settings, accounts, app data, and other items in a separate file stored on your device (MIUI-backup-AllBackup). Note: Performing a factory reset will delete such backups permanently. Remember to copy backups to your computer.
Computer Create a backup on this device, then go to MIUI-backup-AllBackup and copy the backup to your computer via USB cable.
USB drive Save your system settings, accounts, app data, and other items to a USB drive.
Xiaomi Cloud Sync your contacts, photos, videos, the list of your apps, system settings, and Home screen layout with the cloud."
How can I back up items?

"You can only encrypt local backups. Here are some encryption methods you can use: a) Go to Settings > Additional settings on the page with your local backups, tap the button to turn on encryption, and sign in to your Mi Account. Backups will be encrypted automatically after that. Remember that you'll need to sign in to your Mi Account to restore items from encrypted backups. b) If you're using Mi PC Suite to back up items, you can use encryption options there.
Note: Remember the password you set for encrypted backups! You won't be able to decrypt your backups if you forget it."
How do I encrypt my backups?

"Here's how you can restore items that were backed up using different methods:
Mobile device Tap \"Mobile device\" find the option to restore items and select the backup to continue.
Computer Copy the backup from your computer to MIUI-backup-AllBackup via USB cable and restore items from your mobile device.
USB drive Copy the backup from your USB drive to MIUI-backup-AllBackup and select the option to restore items from a USB drive to continue.
Xiaomi Cloud Open Xiaomi Cloud and restore items from there."
How do I restore backed up items?

Para garantir a seguranza da túa conta, inicia sesión en i.mi.com se queres rexeitar a autorización dos servizos de Xiaomi Cloud (incluíndo sincronización e copias de seguranza).
